name: Mega SlowMole
description:
Sega Megadrive/Genesis 16-bit sequel to the NES-game Slow Mole.

Early access. Expected full launch first half of 2023, including cartridge release. 

This demo launches you right into the intense acid section of the game. If you manage to beat it, it loops and gets harder and harder and harder...

In Slow Mole you can get a checkpoint on any screen, but only if you beat the timer. Each level requires speed and strategy.

By supporting this game you'll help getting it to the finish line sooner. We'll also make sure every supporter gets a discount on the upcoming cartridge release. And you'll also get access to the full digital version of the game of course.

Megadrive/Genesis ROM file playable using an emulator or flashcarts on actual hardware or clone consoles as such as the Mega SG.

https://www.patreon.com/erikrosenlund
